Package fi.abo.kogni.soile2.projecthandling.participant

Class ParticipantImpl

java.lang.Object
fi.abo.kogni.soile2.projecthandling.participant.ParticipantImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Participant
Direct Known Subclasses:
DBParticipant
public abstract class ParticipantImpl extends Object implements Participant
This class represents an Instance of a participant within a specific project. Its fields reflect the fields of the Participant schema from the openAPI definition. This instance has a reference to the ID of the participant entry in the participant database, but does NOT have a link to the user that this participant refers to. It is thus disconnected from the user. The connection to the user is only possible by accessing the user datbase and extracting the participatesIn field from that entry. *
Author:
Thomas Pfau

    • setValueForRandomizationGroup

      public void setValueForRandomizationGroup(String randomizerID, Object value)
      Description copied from interface: Participant
      Set the Value that is assigned to this participant by a specific randomizer. This will ensure, that if a a participant encounters a randomizer twice the value is not changed.
      Specified by:
      setValueForRandomizationGroup in interface Participant
      Parameters:
      randomizerID - the ID of the randomizer
      value - the value to set

    • getValueForRandomizationGroup

      public Object getValueForRandomizationGroup(String randomizerID)
      Description copied from interface: Participant
      Get the Value that was assigned to this participant by a specific randomizer (if any is assigned). This will ensure, that if a a participant encounters a randomizer twice the value is not changed.
      Specified by:
      getValueForRandomizationGroup in interface Participant
      Parameters:
      randomizerID - the ID of the randomizer
      Returns:
      The value that was saved for this specific randomizer. The randomizer needs to know what this value is and it has to be depositable in a JsonArray.
